title: Unable to log in to google fit on my Pixel 3 XL
content:
Google fit keeps giving me an error of "Can't verify your account" when I'm trying to sign in.
I have a FULL wifi signal and have tried the same thing using just LTE, and get the same result.
I even went so far as to factory reset my Pixel 3xl, deleted the app, cleared cache and forced stop, tried ALL of those, and on a fully fresh load, I'm getting the SAME error message.  Is Google Fit having issues???
